subject: Re: [junit] Is it really neccessery to use Junit with some kind of IDE ?
msgSnippet: ... Oh yes! That happens as well and all the dev team gets an e-mail if there s a failure. Actually we even have teams getting the build notification
messageBody:
>
> run what tests they do have before they check in, so I suggest that
> having Cruise Control run the full test suites, on everything all the
> time, is vital.
>

Oh yes! That happens as well and all the dev team gets an e-mail if there's
a failure. Actually we even have teams getting the build notification
regardless of the build outcome as a reminder to update their sandbox (we
tried an Eclipse/CVS plugin to do regular checks but it never worked
properly).

- Yagiz -


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
